item.description: Creating an engaged workforce ðŸ’– We apply behavioral Psychology principles and methods to answer questions of employee sentiment within the broader organizational system. An important component of this systemic change process includes our engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. The eg team is also working on an package to capture online survey responses. Engagement survey ðŸ’ƒ The engagement survey has norms representing most major U.
